summary: A gold-digger floozy marries a wealthy wine producer but she secretly takes a young lover with whom she conspires to murder her husband for his fortune.
cast: Diana Dors|Rod Steiger|Tom Tryon|Beulah Bondi|Marie Windsor|Arthur Franz|Luis Van Rooten|Joe De Santis|Argentina Brunetti|Steve Pendleton|Douglas Spencer|Gary Hunley|James Burke|Tol Avery|Dorothy Abbott|Don Avalier|Lovyss Bradley|Ralph Brooks|Gwen Caldwell|Jack Carry|Francis De Sales|Kay English|Maxine Gates|Don C. Harvey|Chuck Hayward|Clegg Hoyt|Helen Jay|Colin Kenny|Mike Lally|Rex Lease|Nelson Leigh|Marilyn Lindsey|Babe London|Herbert Lytton|Maurice Manson|Thomas Martin|William H. O'Brien|Jacqueline Park|Lida Piazza|Mabel Rea|Dawn Richard|Hal Smith|Tony Travers|Theodore von Eltz|Frank Yaconelli
title: Esposa culpable
